


Ruled by Britain (mostly)
Remains part of British empire until 1931
Between 1897 and 1912 1.5m people immigrated
Wilfred laurier first canadian pm who is french canadian
Wilfred Laurier (pm) and Clifford Sifton (minister of interior) planned more immigration to deter american invasion
Sifton advertised to Britain, Poland, Holland, and Germany
The advertisements we kinda scams, offering free land and supplies, not explaining the hardships of Canada
Sifton wanted agrarian peasants
Policy was successful
Alberta and Saskatchewan were created in 1905
Indigenous people we pushed north and assimilated
Chinese tax $500
Multiculturalism starts happening
